entity.Name: Contact

Description.description: Person with whom a business unit has a relationship, such as customer, supplier, and colleague.
Type the city for the primary address.
Type the main phone number associated with the primary address.
Type the primary email address for the contact.
Type the contact's first name to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.
Combines and shows the contact's first and last names so that the full name can be displayed in views and reports.
Type the job title of the contact to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.
Type the contact's last name to make sure the contact is addressed correctly in sales calls, email, and marketing campaigns.
Type the contact's middle name or initial to make sure the contact is addressed correctly.
Type the mobile phone number for the contact.
Select the parent account or parent contact for the contact to provide a quick link to additional details, such as financial information, activities, and opportunities.
Status of the contact.
Shows whether the contact is active or inactive. Inactive contacts are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.
Type the main phone number for this contact.

entity.MobileOfflineFilters: <fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false"> <entity name="contact"> <filter type="and"> <condition attribute="modifiedon" operator="last-x-days" value="10"/> </filter> </entity> </fetch>

Description.description: This form is used by the portal for the user to update their contact info
This form is used by the portal to invite other's to join the portal
This form is used by the portal with Japanese localization for the user to update their contact info
Updated default Contact form.
Displays the Name and Email of active contacts.
Displays contact information in the detail form of any associated account, opportunity, quote, order, or invoice record. This view is in Contacts and Other Contacts side tabs.
Displays contact information in the Members subgrid of Marketing Lists.
Display Contacts BulkOperation View

LocalizedName.description: Contacts: Influenced Deals That We Won

Description.description: Key contacts who influenced deals that have been won in the last 12 months.

LocalizedName.description: Contacts: No Campaign Activities in Last 3 Months
Contacts: No Orders in Last 6 Months
Contacts: Responded to Campaigns in Last 6 Months
